alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 11:31AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, southeastern Liberty, Jefferson, northwestern Taylor, Leon, Franklin, central Madison, southwestern Lowndes, southern Thomas and southern Brooks Counties through NOON EST... At 1131 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Boston to near Eastpoint. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Monticello, Florida State University, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Tallahassee Community College, St. Marks, Lake Park, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Franklin, Greenville, Sopchoppy, Alma, Lake Bradford and Cody. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
